title: The Crow Corner
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:penumbra-bhl]]

[[module CSS]]
#page-title { display: none; }
.avatar-hover { display: none !important; }

:root {
  --header-title: "The Crow Corner";
  --header-subtitle: "now with 30% less asbestos!";
  --accentColor:  180, 140, 226;

  --borderColor: #9e71ba !important;
/*  --bgBadgeColor: (COLOR HERE) !important;*/

  --wlgold: #ffd450;
}

/* Tabview backgrounds are icky */
.yui-navset .yui-content { background:transparent; padding:none;}

 /* FANART FORMATTING */
.art img {max-width: 80%; margin-top: 1em;}

/*  CELL & TABLE STYLING  */
#page-content table { border-collapse: separate; border-spacing: 0.3rem; }
#page-content table img { margin-top: 8px; width: 100%; }

#page-content td {
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 1.5em;
  text-align: center;
  vertical-align: bottom;
  padding: 6px 0px 0px 0px;
  border: 3px solid #878B96;
  background: #151a23;
  width: 33%;
}
.top { margin: auto;  max-width: 50% !important; }

/* Make WL stuff look very very special */
#page-content .wl {
  border-color: var(--wlgold);
  background: #34572c;
}
.wl a{ box-shadow: none !important; color: var(--wlgold) !important;}
.wl a:hover { color: #34502c !important; background-color: var(--wlgold) !important; box-shadow:none !important;}

/* Manually stopping image link from lighting up */
#page-content td a:last-of-type, .wl a:last-of-type { background-color: transparent !important; box-shadow: none !important;}

/* PENUMBRA UNDERLINE FIX */
#page-content a:not([href*="user"]):not([href*="javascript:;"]) {
    text-decoration: none;
}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
Hi, I'm [[*user AnActualCrow]]! This is my authorpage, but you probably knew that already.

Fanart included in article thumbnails are cited below. Anything that isn't cited was drawn by me.

If I can't be contacted for a year, I want all of my co-authored articles to go to their respective co-authors. All remaining articles are to be split between [[*user Dysadron]], [[*user gremlingroup]], and [[*user Ralliston]].
author: AnActualCrow
